citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility provides opportunities for bird species-specific behaviors (perches, nestboxes, foraging, flying, dust-bathing,
and social housing) for different birds, however a documented plan to promote the psychological well-being of birds has
not been developed at the facility and approved by the attending veterinarian (AV). A written environmental enhancement
program that is approved by the AV helps ensure that birds can be provided with adequate species-appropriate
socialization and enrichment. Ensure to work with the AV to develop and document an approved plan.
***Correct by 6/21/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility provides opportunities for bird species-specific behaviors (perches, nestboxes, foraging, flying, dust-bathing, 
and social housing) for different birds, however a documented plan to promote the psychological well-being of birds has 
not been developed at the facility and approved by the attending veterinarian (AV). A written environmental enhancement 
program that is approved by the AV helps ensure that birds can be provided with adequate species-appropriate 
socialization and enrichment. Ensure to work with the AV to develop and document an approved plan. 
***Correct by 6/21/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
